subject: Re: [junit] How to test protected and private methods/ fields?
msgSnippet: ... Not if you use two separate javac invocations. I usually compile my testcases to something like build/testcases and the real classes to build/classes.
messageBody:
Jim Cheesman <jchees@...> wrote:

> If you compile to a seperate directory won't the classes all be
> dumped in the same place?

Not if you use two separate javac invocations. I usually compile my
testcases to something like build/testcases and the "real" classes to
build/classes. To run the unit test both directories have to be in
your classpath of course.

Stefan
